Title: Relates to the elimination of any fees associated with the distinctive license plates for purple heart recipients
Summary: Relates to the elimination of fees and renewal fees associated with the issuance of distinctive license plates for purple heart recipients.
LawCode: Amd ยง404-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the elimination of any fees associated with the distinctive license plates for purple heart recipients
